Jessica Simpson "It's Tuna" VIEW PROJECT â Recent Press SXSW Premieres "Call Me Mommy" âï¸ Written & co-directed by Haley Alea Erickson, "Call Me Mommy" opened the Texas Shorts Program Director Ryan Ovadia on Frame Set Pod âï¸ Ryan breaks down how he works with clients like Instagram and Facebook People: Jessica Simpson Recreates Her Chicken of the Sea Mishap in New Ad âï¸ Jessica Simpson and her daughter Maxwell bring back her iconic Chicken of the Sea moment for the brand. Let's get to the Banter Email us at hello@madebybanter.com Creative content worth talking about Executive Producer Garrett Shannon garrett@madebybanter.com 512-537-1854 â Sales Rep Marla Mossberg marla@ncahoots.tv 310-809-1850 â Los Angeles + Austin Thank you for signing up to the Newsletter! About Us - Binary Banter Solutions Skip to content Home About Us Services Residential Commercial Support Contact Us Home About Us Services Residential Commercial Support Contact Us Facebook-f Google About Us Who are we Your Trusted Cybersecurity and IT Partner Binary Banter is your trusted partner in cybersecurity and IT management. We’re more than just a service provider; we deliver comprehensive Managed IT Services (MSP) and advanced cybersecurity solutions to protect and optimize your digital environment. Our team of experts is dedicated to proactive management, robust security, and exceptional service to ensure your peace of mind in the digital world. Learn more What We Do Commercial Maximize your business efficiency with our tailored commercial IT support solutions. Residential Keep your home computer running smoothly with our expert residential repair services. Discover More Our Value Commitment to Security, Driven by Innovation Our Vision To deliver exceptional customer service, enhance technological resilience, and empower businesses with secure, innovative managed IT and cybersecurity solutions. Learn more Our Mission To be the leading provider of cutting-edge managed IT and cybersecurity solutions, enabling businesses to operate securely and effectively in the digital age. Learn more Our Motive Our motive is to drive positive change by delivering secure, accessible, and reliable managed IT and cybersecurity solutions, empowering businesses to operate efficiently while fostering a safer and more inclusive digital future. Learn more Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much. At Binary Banter, we believe that the strength of our team is the key to our success. It is super easy to use and greatly built. All thanks to banter!” - La Meglio “Banter services have turned communication with our clients and colleagues smoother and more efficient. The setup process was quick and precise, and the user-friendly interface made it easy for our team to manage customer calls and voicemails effortlessly.” - Centaurus “I highly recommend Banter services to anyone looking for reliable and budget friendly solutions for their business communication needs. Thank you Banter for making communication easier!” - Zuven Tech Questions? We’re Here To Help. What is the cost of switching to Banter.io? Replacing an existing business communication system with Banter is extremely affordable. Banter allows you to choose among service packages tailored as per your needs. Please visit our Pricing page to know more. Can I use my existing phone number? Yes. Banter allows you to port your existing phone number and utilise banter services on the same absolutely for free. What are the requirements for using Banter.io? There are no system requirements for using Banter.io as you can add our app on ios or google play. We provide easy self provisioning for any deskphone model with banter. What are the different pricing plans and options for Banter.io? Businesses have the feasibility to choose from multiple plans that are segregated on the basis of features and benefits offered by Banter.io. We provide customised plans for a company with 10 lines. Click here to learn more. Can I try Banter.io before paying for it? Yes, users can avail Banter Free Trial facility to explore the application and understand the compatibility between Banter services and your business requirements. Click here to try Banter. Follow Discover all 24 employees Report this company About us Banter. A word that we think speaks to how brands should behave in the new world. 

Our mission is to help brands fuel meaningful conversations. We’re a specialist brand experience and engagement marketing agency with a relentless focus on creating genuine connectedness between brands and audiences.

With earned thinking at the core, we believe in the importance of engagement that can be amplified. 

To learn more about Banter, please visit www.banter.agency.

Who knew the ' Banter effect' was a thing? 6 Like Comment Share Banter 4,086 followers 1mo Report this post Inspiring the world from Barcelona. That’s CUPRA’s mantra, and this week, Melbourne felt it.

We at Banter helped launch the bold new CUPRA Terramar while marking three years of CUPRA Australia in style.
 
From media drives to a 200-person takeover of The Timber Yards, the week was full of energy, edge and expression. Spanish-Aussie chef Miguel Maestre brought the heat and the charm, serving up flavour with serious flair.
 
To close it out, we flipped the venue into a late-night party with Balearic vibes. A big finish for a big week.
 
Thanks to the legends at CUPRA Australia. One big dream team. Vamos. +5 19 Like Comment Share Banter 4,086 followers 1mo Report this post More brands are realising what a smart play women’s sport really is. 

Earlier this year, Banter brokered a first-of-its-kind partnership spanning three netball clubs, uniting rivals in the name of growing both the Aware Super brand and the game itself. Proof that when you back women’s sport, everyone wins.

We were chuffed to see all three partner teams make the finals and are even happier to see Aware Super on the dresses of both sides going head-to-head this Sunday.

Best of luck to the Melbourne Vixens and Netball WA & West Coast Fever for this weekend!

If you're a marketer thinking about women's sport, just do it! …more 10 Like Comment Share Banter 4,086 followers 1mo Report this post For two years, we backed Surf Life Saving Australia with everything we had.

We fought for the cause, stretched every cent, and poured our heart into every brief.

Nine months ago, we launched a campaign we are still seriously proud of.

If you know Banter you know we scrap for what matters. 

We chase the yes. 

After endless calls, emails and a heap of hustle, we convinced former Nipper Angus Sampson to front the 2024 summer campaign for a fraction of his usual fee.

The result? Millions of earned media impressions. More importantly, 37,000 downloads of the new Beach Passport. A simple action that could genuinely help save lives.

And if you are heading to the beach, do yourself a favour and download the Beach Passport.

We are bloody proud of this one. …more 4 Like Comment Share Banter 4,086 followers 1mo Report this post Sponsorship marketing is not just about a logo on a guernsey. Sure that helps. But there's more to it. It’s about connecting with real fans, in real moments, in ways that actually matter.

That’s what we at Banter helped Aware Super do, shaping a sponsorship strategy across four teams in two codes, designed to drive genuine connection and meaning. 

And last weekend, it came to life at the first Super Helpful Game with the GWS GIANTS . 

We brought the spotlight to the people who keep our communities running. From nurses to firefighters, teachers to ambo, with 250 local heroes recognised on the big screen, across socials, and in a moment of collective cheers at quarter-time.

Because when you get sponsorship right, it’s more than just branding. It’s brand impact …more 7 Like Comment Share Banter 4,086 followers 2mo Edited Report this post We take sponsorship marketing very seriously at Banter . It's not just about doing the thing right, it's about doing the right thing. So this one means a lot!

Thrilled to be shortlisted at the Mumbrella Travel Marketing Awards for Best Brand Partnership. 

This recognition reflects the full journey: from a deep sponsorship audit to razor-sharp strategy to standout execution, helping Princess Cruises connect with the Sydney Swans . 

Bring on August 28th! #MumbrellaTravelAwards 8 Like Comment Share Banter 4,086 followers 2mo Edited Report this post From stadiums to street corners and events to expos, our Banter team are just about everywhere in the next fortnight...
 
- We’re helping Aware Super with the inaugural Super Helpful game, honouring 280 people who do wonders for the community at Engie Stadium with the GWS Giants. 
- We’re live at the Metcash Expo with our friends at My Muscle Chef and Eatlean® - We’re travelling around the country with Ingenia Communities Group supporting their partnership with Apollo Motorhomes.
- We’re getting the taste of MILO ( Nestlé ) out and about, as part of our sampling roadshow program in the Sunshine Coast. 
- We’re at the Sydney Swans Captain’s and Kid’s Run, a double hit of fun with Volkswagen Group Australia and Adora Fertility . 
- We head to the SCG for the Swans vs Kangaroos game, activating Volkswagen’s end-to-end sponsorship. 
 
IRL is well and truly alive. Exciting times ahead. 8 Like Comment Share Banter 4,086 followers 2mo Report this post Not all heroes wear guernseys. Some wear scrubs, hi-vis, or simply carry a quiet determination to help others. 

Thrilled at Banter to be helping Aware Super launch the inaugural Super Helpful Game with the GWS GIANTS , a special occasion to recognise and celebrate the everyday super helpful people who keep our communities strong. 

From frontline workers and nurses to teachers and carers, these are the people who quietly go above and beyond every day, often without seeking recognition. 

This Sunday July 12th, 250 everyday heroes from health and emergency services will be celebrated with game tickets, big-screen shoutouts, and a special quarter-time tribute. 

Here's to those that are Super Helpful! 11 Like Comment Share Banter 4,086 followers 2mo Report this post Yesterday our very own Lucie Drysdale spoke at the Flaunt Talent Discovery Day alongside a number of other very well-credentialed and experienced humans. 

Lucie spoke to her first year in the industry to help inspire the next cohort of graduates. 

Big ups Lucie. 18 2 Comments Like Comment Share Banter 4,086 followers 2mo Report this post One year of Banter 2.0.

Twelve months ago, we hit go on our next chapter: fully independent, fiercely ambitious and ready to build something bold.

Since then:

- We’ve grown from 7 to 13. Still tight-knit, just a little louder in the kitchen.

- Designed and built our own HQ in Rosebery. It’s creative, full of life and yes, it has dogs and drinks.

- Backed emerging talent, gave them space to grow and watched them do awesome things.

- Promoted from within, including one superstar who got the nod on her first day back from mat leave.

- Helped brands rethink sponsorships: rewriting, renegotiating and reframing what great looks like.

- Built mobile games for the footy. Turned kids’ drawings into centrepieces at Vivid. Reimagined consumer promotions with a dash of AR magic.

- Introduced Australia to Gilli Danda. Because cricket (and culture) deserves it.

- Delivered employee experiences, dreamy dinners, media events, expo stands and big activations that sparked real buzz and made noise IRL and URL (see what we did there).

- Launched pop-ups that stopped people in their tracks, from spirits to boots to ice cream.

- Ran one of Australia’s biggest influencer campaigns with a TikTok takeover. Big spreadsheets. Big talent. Big results.

- Created culture-shaping work with some of Australia’s most-loved talent and a few soon-to-be cult favourites.

- Welcomed an industry powerhouse in PR and Social to lead our newest offering. Already, five amazing clients have put their trust in us, including a few household names and some we’re soon to make part of the household.

- And in an industry famous for churn, we’ve kept our 9.5-year streak alive. Not a single teammate lost to a competitor. Just good people sticking around and growing together. Legends, every one of you.

We’re still small. Still scrappy. Still very hungry.

Super proud of our first year as an indie agency. Massive thanks to all our clients, collaborators and mates who made the last twelve months fly by.

The countdown to turning 10 is officially on. Live Music Radiates from Canopy by Hilton Hotel - West Palm Beach | Banter | American Restaurant in Downtown West Palm Beach Skip to main content About Blog Menus Upcoming Events Private Events Reservations Toggle Navigation About Blog Menus Upcoming Events Private Events Canopy Hotel Treehouse Press Reservations Email Signup Facebook Instagram Email powered by BentoBox Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Live Music Radiates from Canopy by Hilton Hotel - West Palm Beach Located in the heart of downtown, you’ll find Banter, a fantastic restaurant and bar centered in Canopy by Hilton- West Palm Beach . Banter is located within the 6-story atrium that is sure to deliver a dramatic, yet soothing haven. It is the perfect place to hear live music and to have breathtaking views of lush greenery and crafted dishes. A variety of local artists regularly perform in this hidden gem. Banter is a MUST for local live music from 6:00 pm to 9:00 pm on Thursday, Friday, and Saturday. To make Banter even more irresistible for your evening plans, Happy Hour is available Tuesday through Saturday from 4:00 pm to 7:00 pm. Local Artists Live At Banter If the flavors you will indulge in with every bite and handcrafted cocktails aren’t convincing, the live music lineup is sure to exceed your expectations. Banter has a few regulars you won’t want to miss. Matt Brown- Matt is a rising soul musician. Primarily a bassist, he is fluent in a variety of instruments, including vocals, piano, percussion, guitar, ukulele, and whatever else he can get his hands on! Check him out on Instagram @mattbrown.music or find his music on all streaming platforms. Sierra Lane- Sierra will bring all the island vibes to any event. She is a singer located out of Jupiter, Florida. You can find her on Instagram @sierralanemusic and listen to her music on Spotify. Summer Gill- Summer is a singer-songwriter out of Florida. Her original music is inspired by pop, blues, and alternative styles. You can find her on Instagram @summerstormgill or on Facebook . Sweet Butter Joe- Joe began playing music at a young age in Wisconsin. His music is different from the usual live music offerings. Joe only uses saxophone, beatbox, loop pedals, vocals, and various effects. Check out his music on Instagram @sweetbutterjoe. Join the Regular Roster Canopy by Hilton- West Palm Beach is always looking for new and truly unique musicians in the area to add to our lineup. Contact Jen Garrett at Canopy at Jen.Garrett@hilton.com to schedule an audition to play live at Banter in downtown West Palm Beach. Banter at Canopy by Hilton - West Palm Beach is located in downtown West Palm Beach. Find us inside Canopy, a boutique hotel at 380 Trinity Pl, West Palm Beach, FL. Our open and airy 6-story atrium and nature-inspired space will surround you as you dine! Enjoy inspired dishes and handcraft cocktails that will deliver delectable flavors in every bite. Reservations can be made through our profile on Open Table . For even more Banter, follow us on Facebook and Instagram . Mobile App Our mobile app keeps your communication activity organised and easily accessible while on-the-go. Questions? We’re Here To Help. What is the cost of switching to Banter.io? Replacing an existing business communication system with Banter is extremely affordable. Banter allows you to choose among service packages tailored as per your needs. Please visit our Pricing Page to know more. Can I use my existing phone number? Yes. Banter allows you to port your existing phone number and utilize banter services on the same absolutely for free. What are the requirements for using Banter.io? There are no system requirements for using Banter.io as you can add our app on iOS or Google Play. We provide easy self-provisioning for any deskphone model with banter. What are the different pricing plans and options for Banter.io? Businesses have the feasibility to choose from multiple plans that are segregated on the basis of features and benefits offered by Banter.io. We provide customized plans for a company with 10 lines.
